task_description: Add missing schizophrenia spectrum and personality disorders content to week 10, and rewrite ALL explanations in weeks 10 & 11 to be ADHD-friendly: concrete, detailed mechanisms, step-by-step, no metaphors, clear structure

phases.name: Content Research
phases.description: Extract all details from PDFs for missing content and analyze explanation quality requirements
deliverables: Complete schizophrenia spectrum details from PDF (symptoms, types, examples, criteria)
Complete personality disorders details from PDF (all 10 disorders, cluster organization, characteristics)
Analysis of what makes explanations ADHD-friendly vs current problems
success_criteria: All schizophrenia spectrum disorders covered with precise criteria
All 10 personality disorders covered with cluster groupings
Clear guidelines for concrete, mechanism-focused explanations

phases.name: Content Writing
phases.description: Write new sections for missing content and rewrite all existing explanations to be detailed, concrete, and ADHD-friendly
deliverables: New schizophrenia spectrum section with 15+ questions (detailed explanations)
New personality disorders section with 20+ questions (detailed explanations)
Rewritten explanations for all week 10 existing topics (abnormality, anxiety, OCD, mood)
Rewritten explanations for all week 11 topics (all therapy types)
success_criteria: All explanations are concrete (no vague 'involves' language)
All explanations include HOW mechanisms work (step-by-step processes)
No metaphors or abstract analogies used
Clear structure: mechanism → consequence → clinical example
Each 'correct' explanation has 3-5 sentences with specific details
Each 'incorrect' explanation explains WHY wrong with specific contrast

phases.name: Integration & Quality Check
phases.description: Integrate new content into week10.json, ensure consistency, verify ADHD-friendliness
deliverables: Updated week10.json with new sections integrated
Verification that all explanations meet ADHD-friendly criteria
success_criteria: Week 10 includes all 7 topics (abnormality, anxiety, OCD, mood, schizophrenia, personality, classification)
All questions have detailed, mechanism-focused explanations
JSON structure is valid and consistent

expected_deliverables: Complete week10.json with schizophrenia spectrum section (15+ questions)
Complete week10.json with personality disorders section (20+ questions)
All explanations in weeks 10 & 11 rewritten to be concrete, detailed, mechanism-focused, ADHD-friendly
success_criteria: Week 10 covers ALL content from slides (no missing disorders)
All explanations explain HOW things work, not just WHAT they are
Zero metaphors or abstract analogies in explanations
Each explanation includes specific mechanisms and step-by-step processes
ADHD-friendly structure: clear, organized, no fluff, concrete language
